name: Katya Chilly
description: '''Kateryna Petrivna Kondratenko''' ({{langx|uk|Катерина Петрівна Кондратенко}}; born 12 July 1978), known professionally as '''Katya Chilly''', is a [[Ukrainians|Ukrainian]] [[Singing|singer]] and [[songwriter]]. Her style is a fusion of [[World music|world]] and [[New-age music|new-age]] music.
